data.title: The Best In Gospel Music!
data.meta_description: Formerly Verity Records, RCA Inspiration is the #1 label in Gospel music! Kirk Franklin, DOE, Kierra Sheard, Melvin Crispell, III & more! Join the newsletter today!
data.text:
LATEST NEWS

GRAMMY®–WINNER DONALD LAWRENCE HONORS TWINKIE CLARK WITH HIS LATEST ALBUM, DONALD LAWRENCE PRESENTS POWER: A TRIBUTE TO TWINKIE CLARK, AVAILABLE NOW

Nashville, TN (September 15, 2023) – Donald Lawrence has released his latest full-length album, Donald Lawrence Presents Power: A Tribute to Twinkie Clark. The GRAMMY®-winning legendary producer, recording artist, songwriter […]

More News

Lyric of the day

You ain't seen nothin yet!

You Ain't Seen Nothin Yet - Kierra Sheard
